data.name: CashAdvance_Attested_Body
data.value: Your requested cash advance with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been attested by the budget owner. It will now proceed to payout to you.

data.name: CashAdvance_Attested_Subject
data.value: [OrganizationName] Cash Advance Attested: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: CashAdvance_Deattested_Body
data.value:
Your requested cash advance with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been DE-attested by the budget owner. This usually indicates some sort of problem with your request.
Expect more communication from the budget owner to follow on the matter.

data.name: CashAdvance_Deattested_Subject
data.value: [OrganizationName] Cash Advance DE-attested: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: CashAdvance_Denied_Body
data.value:
Your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] concerning [RequestPurpose] has been denied. The text below was given as reason for denying it:
[EmbeddedPreformattedText]

data.name: CashAdvance_Denied_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Cash Advance DENIED: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: CashAdvance_PaidOut_Body
data.value:
Your request for a cash advance with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been marked as paid out by the organization's accountants.
This means you should see the amount on your account shortly.

data.name: CashAdvance_PaidOut_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Cash Advance Paid: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: CashAdvance_Requested_Body
data.value:
[ConcernedPersonName] has requested a cash advance of [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] for the purpose of [RequestPurpose]. This money is part of your budget, [BudgetName].
Please log on to [InstallationName] at [ExternalUrl]Financial/AttestCosts to attest or deny.
data.comment: This is sent to the budget owner(s) only.

data.name: CashAdvance_Requested_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName] - ACTION ITEM] Cash Advance Requested: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] - Attestation Needed

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Attested_Body
data.value: Your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been attested by the budget owner. It will be paid out to you when the receipts are confirmed valid.
data.comment: This is sent to the claimer.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Attested_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim Attested: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Created_Body
data.value:
[ConcernedPersonName] has created an expense claim against the budget of [BudgetName] for the amount of [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]. The claim concerns [RequestPurpose]. You will need to attest this expense claim.
Please log on to [InstallationName] at [ExternalUrl]Financial/AttestCosts to attest or deny.
data.comment: This is sent to the budget owner(s)only.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Created_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName] - ACTION ITEM] Expense Claim Created: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] - Attestation Needed

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Deattested_Body
data.value:
Your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been DE-attested by the budget owner. This usually indicates some sort of problem with your expense claim.
Expect more communication from the budget owner to follow on the matter.
data.comment: This is sent to the claimer.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Deattested_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim DE-attested: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Denied_Body
data.value:
Your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] concerning [RequestPurpose] has been denied. The text below was given as reason for denying it:
[EmbeddedPreformattedText]
data.comment: This is sent to the claimer.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Denied_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim DENIED: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Devalidated_Body
data.value:
The receipts for your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], have been DE-validated by the financial record keepers of the organization. This usually indicates some sort of problem with the documentation of your expense claim.
Expect more communication to follow on the matter. If you don't hear from record keepers in short time on this matter, do follow up with them.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Devalidated_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim Receipts DE-validated: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: ExpenseClaim_PaidOut_Body
data.value:
Your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], has been marked as paid out by the organization's accountants.
This means you should see the amount on your account shortly.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_PaidOut_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim Paid: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Validated_Body
data.value:
The receipts for your expense claim with [OrganizationName] for [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat], concerning [RequestPurpose], have been validated by people responsible for keeping the records in order.
The claim will be paid out to you when the amount has also been attested by the budget owner.
data.comment: This is sent to the claimer.

data.name: ExpenseClaim_Validated_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Expense Claim Receipts Validated: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]

data.name: InboundInvoice_Created_Body
data.value:
An invoice from [Supplier], concerning [Description], has been filed against your budget of [BudgetName] for the amount of [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat]. You must attest this invoice before it proceeds to payout.
Please log on to [InstallationName] at [ExternalUrl]Financial/AttestCosts to attest or deny.

data.name: InboundInvoice_Created_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName] - ACTION ITEM] Invoice Filed: [CurrencyCode] [BudgetAmountFloat] - Attestation Needed

data.name: Membership_New_Added_Body
data.value: A new [Regular] was manually added to [OrganizationName] within an area of yours.

data.name: Membership_New_Added_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] New [Regular]: [PersonName], [PersonGeography] [CountryCode] (manual)

data.name: Membership_New_Selfsignup_Body
data.value: A new [Regular] has signed up for [OrganizationName] within an area of yours.

data.name: Membership_New_Selfsignup_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] New [Regular]: [PersonName], [PersonGeography] [CountryCode]

data.name: Membership_Renewed_Manual_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] [Regularship] renewed: [PersonName], [PersonGeography] [CountryCode] (manual)

data.name: OutboundComm_Resolved_Body
data.value: Your message has been queued for delivery and the recipients have been resolved. Your mail will be sent to, or be attempted to sent to, [RecipientCount] people in [Geography] in [OrganizationName].

data.name: OutboundComm_Resolved_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Comm recipients determined for [GeographyName]: [RecipientCount]

data.name: OutboundComm_Sent_Body
data.value:
Your message to [GeographyName] has been sent to all scheduled recipients. Of the [RecipientCount] planned recipients, [RecipientsSuccess] succeeded from Swarmops' horizon. (These can fail later for a number of reasons, from broken computers to hospitalized recipients.)
Time spent transmitting: [TransmissionTime].

data.name: OutboundComm_Sent_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Comms transmitted: [GeographyName]

data.name: Password_CannotReset2FA_Body
data.value:
Somebody, most likely you, requested a reset of the password associated with this mail address at [InstallationName]. However, two-factor authentication has been enabled for this account for heightened security. Therefore, the password CANNOT be reset by simple means.
Please contact a personnel administrator at [InstallationName] to resolve your problem and issue a new password following a more rigorous identification procedure matching the two-factor security level.
Thank you for your understanding.

data.name: Password_CannotReset2FA_Subject
data.value: [[InstallationName]] Cannot Reset Password

data.name: Password_Changed_Body
data.value:
Your [InstallationName] password was just changed at [ExternalUrl].
If you did not just perform this password change, there has been a security breach. If this is the case, please lock your account down IMMEDIATELY by clicking the following link:
[ExternalUrl]Security/AccountLockdown?Mail=[MailAddress]&Ticket=[TicketCode]
If you confirm a lockdown on the link above, any existing sessions will terminate immediately, logons with the newly-set password will be locked out, and administrators will contact you to verify what happened and work with you to re-enable your account.
However, if it was you yourself who changed the password just now, and thereby caused this notification to be sent, everything is obviously fine and just as it should be. Carry on.

data.name: Password_Changed_Subject
data.value: [[InstallationName]] Password Changed

data.name: Password_ResetByCrew_Body
data.value:
People at [OrganizationName] have issued a password reset ticket to your account, presumably at your request. This ticket is valid for the next 24 hours.
Please follow this link to reset your password and re-enable any two-factor authentication, if it was previously enabled:
[ExternalUrl]Security/ResetPassword?Ticket=[TicketCode]
This ticket will expire in 24 hours. If you do not reset your password in this time frame, you will need to contact the administrators at [OrganizationName] to issue a new password reset ticket.

data.name: Password_ResetByCrew_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName]] Password Reset Ticket

data.name: Password_ResetOnRequest_Body
data.value:
Somebody, most likely you, requested a reset of the password associated with this email address at [InstallationName]. If this was you, please follow the link below in the next 60 minutes to complete the password reset procedure:
[ExternalUrl]Security/ResetPassword?Ticket=[TicketCode]
If you did NOT request a password reset, you can (and should) ignore this mail. The password reset request will expire in one hour. (If you are getting a large number of these password reset links that you did not request, please notify the administrator.)

data.name: Password_ResetOnRequest_Subject
data.value: [[InstallationName]] Password Reset Ticket

data.name: Receipts_Filed_Body
data.value:
Receipts have been filed that need validation for their financial processes to continue.
Please log on to [InstallationName] at [ExternalUrl]Financial/ValidateReceipts to validate or reject them.

data.name: Receipts_Filed_Subject
data.value: [[OrganizationName] - ACTION ITEM] Receipts Filed - Validation Needed

data.name: System_DatabaseSchemaUpgraded_Body
data.value:
Swarmops Backend [SwarmopsVersion] on host [HostName] has successfully upgraded the Swarmops database schema to revision [DbVersion].
This is for information only. You do not need to take action.

data.name: System_DatabaseSchemaUpgraded_Subject
data.value: Swarmops database upgraded

data.name: System_DatabaseUpgradeFailed_Body
data.value:
Swarmops Backend [SwarmopsVersion] on Host [Hostname] has FAILED in upgrading the Swarmops database. This is usually due to a transient external network error, causing the patch file retrieval to fail.
We are currently at database schema revision [DbVersion], but are trying to upgrade to [DbVersionExpected].
The upgrade will be retried every hour. Some functionality may be disabled until the database has been upgraded. If you want to troubleshoot manually, the database upgrade packages are retrieved from packages.swarmops.com, the same place where apt-get fetches its software packages.

data.name: System_DatabaseUpgradeFailed_Subject
data.value: Swarmops database upgrade FAILED

data.name: System_Exception_Body
data.value:
An unhandled exception was thrown in Swarmops:
[EmbeddedPreformattedText]

data.name: System_Exception_Subject
data.value: Swarmops EXCEPTION!

data.name: System_MailServerTest_Body
data.value: This is a test mail sent by Swarmops [SwarmopsVersion] running on [HostName]. You just changed the mail server settings. To verify that the new settings are correct, Swarmops dispatches this test message to be sent from the back end.

data.name: System_MailServerTest_Subject
data.value: Swarmops Mail Server Test

data.name: System_Startup_Body
data.value: Swarmops Backend version [SwarmopsVersion] on host [HostName] has successfully started and connected to database and notification frameworks.

data.name: System_Startup_Subject
data.value: Swarmops Backend operational
